alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; Richland; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 9:49PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wibaux, southeastern Roosevelt, eastern Dawson and Richland Counties through 1045 PM MDT... At 948 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lambert to 9 miles northwest of Carlyle. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Wibaux, Fairview, Bainville, Savage, Lambert, Carlyle, Snowden, Enid, Saint Phillip, Nohly, Wooley, Crane, Yates, Hodges, Midway and Burns. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
